======Prints verbose debug messages on spawners.======

= Description =

Prints verbose debug messages relating to the Ch1ckensCoop mod and spawners.

These messages include:

  * Warning: over 2000 edicts, won't spawn
  * Warning: ran out of aliens, won't spawn
  * Message: Set number of aliens, max live, and interval

If this cvar is set to 3, it will also display:

  * Warning: current number of aliens = max live aliens, won't spawn
